body_html:
Ok, I'll see what I can do.
Are you open to docker multi-stage builds? It requires a recent version of Docker to build, but the generated container image is still compatible with older versions of Docker.
body_text:
Ok, I'll see what I can do.
Are you open to docker multi-stage builds? It requires a recent version of Docker to build, but the generated container image is still compatible with older versions of Docker.
body:
Ok, I'll see what I can do.
Are you open to docker [multi-stage builds](https://docs.docker.com/engine/userguide/eng-image/multistage-build/)? It requires a recent version of Docker to build, but the generated container image is still compatible with older versions of Docker.
